hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT FILE_ID, ASSET_ID, NEW_NAME, ORIGINAL_NAME, REPOSITORY_PATH, FILE_ICON, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID FROM USR_ASSET_FILE WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO USR_ASSET_FILE ( FILE_ID, ASSET_ID, NEW_NAME, ORIGINAL_NAME, REPOSITORY_PATH, FILE_ICON, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ${FILE_ID}, ${ASSET_ID}, ${NEW_NAME}, ${ORIGINAL_NAME}, ${REPOSITORY_PATH}, ${FILE_ICON}, ${FILE_SIZE}, ${FILE_TYPE}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID} )

UPDATE USR_ASSET_FILE SET ASSET_ID = ${ASSET_ID}, NEW_NAME = ${NEW_NAME}, ORIGINAL_NAME = ${ORIGINAL_NAME}, REPOSITORY_PATH = ${REPOSITORY_PATH}, FILE_ICON = ${FILE_ICON}, FILE_SIZE = ${FILE_SIZE}, FILE_TYPE = ${FILE_TYPE}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
